headline: Tell HN: Razorpay a YC company shared donor data without court order
description:
Razorpay is an Indian payment platform[1].

Recently Indian police arrested[2] the co-founder of a fact-checking website for a tweet he did in 2018. There are reports that Government is trying to nab him for reporting the fake news and religious hatred the current regime has been peddling.

Police demanded the data of the donors to the fact-checking website from Razorpay and they complied without a court order[3].

1: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/razorpay

2: https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/jun/28/delhi-police-arrest-muslim-journalist-mohammed-zubair-india-bjp

3: https://inc42.com/buzz/razorpay-alt-news-controversy-spotlight-on-data-security-user-consent
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：Razorpay一家YC公司在没有法院命令的情况下共享捐赠者数据
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：Razorpay一家YC公司在沒有法院命令的情況下共享捐贈者數據
description_zh-Hans:
Razorpay是印度的一个支付平台[1]。

最近，印度警方逮捕了[2]一个事实核查网站的联合创始人，因为他在2018年做了一条推特。有报道称，政府正试图抓捕他，因为他报道了现政权兜售的假新闻和宗教仇恨。

警方要求Razorpay提供事实核查网站捐助者的数据，他们在没有法院命令的情况下遵守了规定[3]。

1: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/razorpay

2: https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/jun/28/delhi-police-arrest-muslim-journalist-mohammed-zubair-india-bjp

3: https://inc42.com/buzz/razorpay-alt-news-controversy-spotlight-on-data-security-user-consent
description_zh-Hant:
Razorpay是印度的一個支付平臺[1]。

最近，印度警方逮捕了[2]一個事實核查網站的聯合創始人，因為他在2018年做了一條推特。有報道稱，政府正試圖抓捕他，因為他報道了現政權兜售的假新聞和宗教仇恨。

警方要求Razorpay提供事實核查網站捐助者的數據，他們在沒有法院命令的情況下遵守了規定[3]。

1: https://www.ycombinator.com/companies/razorpay

2: https://www.theguardian.com/world/2022/jun/28/delhi-police-arrest-muslim-journalist-mohammed-zubair-india-bjp

3: https://inc42.com/buzz/razorpay-alt-news-controversy-spotlight-on-data-security-user-consent
